info.title: E-goi
info.description: E-goi is a Multichannel Marketing Automation Platform, including email marketing services, SMS, Voice Broadcast, Push Notifications, Web Push and Forms to Capture, Automate, Communicate, Analyse and Generate more Sales. The connector allow users to add/update contacts, attach tags and send transactional SMS.

get.description: The API returns the available lists of contacts
The API returns all contacts from a chosen list

post.description: Create a new contact to a specific list.

birth_date.description: Birth date of the contact. (format: yyyy-mm-dd)
birth_date.title: Birthdate

post.description: Attaches a tag of your choosing to an existing contact.

items.title: Contact UID
items.description: contact IDs to attach the tag.

birth_date.description: Birth date of the contact. (format: yyyy-mm-dd)
birth_date.title: Birthdate

post.description: Send an SMS to a contact

to.description: The contact of the recipient. format should be countryCode-phoneNumber. (ex: 351-911111111)
to.title: Send to

textBody.description: The content of the message. (ex: Hello!)
textBody.title: Message

encoding.description: The encoding of the message. (ex: unicode)
encoding.title: Encoding

maxCount.description: The maximum amount of messages to be sent (if the Text Body is too big for a single message).
maxCount.title: Amount

customData.description: Extra Data related to the campaign to be re-sent via WebHook. (ex: meta-data)
customData.title: Custom Data

registered.description: Option to register the message. Its an exclusive feature for senders that require it.
registered.title: Registered

group.description: The group of the message. (ex: welcome)
group.title: Group
